name: FanlightSync
0:
”Alexa, turn on office light.”
”Alexa, set the livingroom fan to fifty percent”
”Alexa, dim the downstair light to seventy percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Turn your voice into a convenient remote control for your ceiling fan or lights.

Control your 'Satellite' fans and lights. Here are some examples to get started:
"Alexa, turn on bedroom fan."
"Alexa, turn off the living room fan."
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light."
"Alexa, turn off office light."
"Alexa, set the living room fan to 50%."
"Alexa, dim kitchen light to 60%."

Note: In order to use Amazon Alexa with Satellite Fan/Light products, you'll need a Satellite account. Give your Satellite Fan/Light names that will be natural to speak. Please rename your device by using 'Satellite Fanlight Sync' (Device->Setting->Connections->Amazon Echo->Rename your device)

Visit https://youtu.be/K1g4znhKq3E for further details about Satellite Fan/Light controller's functionality.
